sub_title: Digital Business professional open for new opportunities
summary:
I am driven by my never-ending curiosity for digital and media and with my over 15 years of experience in the business, I still thrive on new challenges. I am a creative multitasking problem solver and a performance driven team player. I am used to manage multi functional teams, large scaled programs, drive change projects and implement marketing campaigns within complex global matrix organizations. Building strong internal and external relations through sincere interest in communication has always been a part of my life – both privately and professionally. 

Strengths

Interpret, define, realize and manage customers’ requirements and expectations for business transformation and development from a digital user experience perspective. Identifying needs and demands, proposing the best solutions, plan, drive and build strategy to deliver innovative results and in an creative way. Managing several initiatives, projects and issues simultaneously, keeping momentum. Connecting people and pulling strings to ensure timely deliveries with optimized results – with an end-to-end user focus.
